results.title: Treatment of pediatric pulmonary hypertension with simvastatin: an observational study.
results.text_hl: A favorable response to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was defined as a 20% decrease in the average measurement of the gradient of @<m>DISEASE_Tricuspid_Valve_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014262 @@@tricuspid valve regurgitation@@@ or a 20% decrease in right ventricular anterior wall thickness when @<m>DISEASE_Tricuspid_Valve_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014262 @@@tricuspid valve regurgitation@@@ resolved during treatment.

citations.NLM: King WT, Day RW. Treatment of pediatric pulmonary hypertension with simvastatin: an observational study. Pediatr Pulmonol. 2011 Mar;46(3):261-5. PMID: 20967835
citations.BibTeX: @article{20967835, title={Treatment of pediatric pulmonary hypertension with simvastatin: an observational study.}, author={King WT and Day RW}, journal={Pediatr Pulmonol}, volume={46}, number={3}, pages={261-5}}
